attr.title: Super Gaelic Dodgeball
attr.desc: Mildly violent Dodgeball game made for Awful Winter Jam 2018
attr.desc_md: **Super Gaelic Dodgeball** is a mildly violent Dodgeball game made for Awful Winter Jam 2018. It features 8-bit pixel art style, support for keyboard and gamepads, and NES-inspired gameplay.
attr.inst: Get the game on shoehead.itch.io/sgdb and place all game files in the ports/supergaelicdodgeball/gamedata/ directory.
attr.inst_md: Get the game on the [shoehead itch.io page](https://shoehead.itch.io/sgdb), and place all game files in the ports/supergaelicdodgeball/gamedata/ directory.
